vote.title: Authorize the (1) application for and acceptance of a series of grants from the U.S. Department of Transportation, Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) for the federal share of the eligible airport programs and projects within the Dallas Airport System (Grant No. TBD, CFDA No. 20.106) in a total amount of $75,000,000.00, of which $30,000,000 is Coronavirus Aid Relief and Economic Security (CARES) Act funding; (2) establishment of appropriations in the amount of $75,000,000.00 in the FAA Airport Improvement Program (AIP) Grant - FY 21 Love Field Entitlement and Discretionary Grant Fund and CARES Act Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of grant funds in the amount of $75,000,000.00 in the FAA AIP Grant - FY 21 Love Field Entitlement and Discretionary Grant Fund and CARES Act Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the grant agreement - Total amount $75,000,000.00 - Financing:  Federal Aviation Administration Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize the (1) application for and acceptance of a series of grants from the U.S. Department of Transportation, Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) for the federal share of the eligible airport programs and projects within the Dallas Airport System (Grant No. TBD, CFDA No. 20.106) in a total amount of $75,000,000.00, of which $30,000,000 is Coronavirus Aid Relief and Economic Security (CARES) Act funding; (2) establishment of appropriations in the amount of $75,000,000.00 in the FAA Airport Improvement Program (AIP) Grant - FY 21 Love Field Entitlement and Discretionary Grant Fund and CARES Act Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of grant funds in the amount of $75,000,000.00 in the FAA AIP Grant - FY 21 Love Field Entitlement and Discretionary Grant Fund and CARES Act Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the grant agreement - Total amount $75,000,000.00 - Financing:  Federal Aviation Administration Grant Funds
